Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The battle rages on for God only knows how long.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Their blades cross and clash with each other like interlocking lightning.'}
{3: 'The standoff lasts only a moment. Alpha shifts her posture, sliding forward to the left in an attempt to throw the girl in black off balance.'}
{3: 'The girl in black, however, quickly adjusts herself, rotating her left foot backward to stabilize her stance and aiming her sword at Alpha once more.'}
{3: "They're now both visibly strained. A faint excitement flickers in Alpha's eyes."}
{3: 'The last time she had to go all out in a fight was when she was in Fort Winter.'}
{3: 'The girl in black suddenly blurts this out during their standoff.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Well, thank you?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Alpha is more soft-spoken now, except she's grown more alarmed."}
{3: "Alpha can't seem to figure out who this girl is. There is no telling how strong she is, and Alpha doesn't think Babylonia could suddenly come up with a Construct as powerful as this."}
{3: "During their standoff, Alpha doesn't sense any trace of the Punishing Virus in her, which rules out the possibility of her being an Ascendant."}
{2: '???', 3: 'All those "conflicts" you\'ve been through have made you who you are today. I can just tell.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...You sure like yapping, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Unfortunately... you\'re an "outsider" just like them, so I can\'t let you walk away a winner.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Alpha's body, however, acts on its own before she snaps back."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'She spins around and slashes her sword through this "thing" that approaches her from behind, splitting it in half.'}
{3: 'The bisected Hetero-Creature, half dead, struggles to crawl toward Alpha. In the distance, more Hetero-Creatures and Corrupted emerge, their target evident.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Why in the world are these Hetero-Creatures...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even after the emergence of the Hetero Tower and the changes in Hetero-Creatures, it still makes no sense for them to actively attack Ascendants stronger than themselves.'}
{3: 'Not to mention that there are ordinary Corrupted among them.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Is someone controlling them?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha turns around, only to see the girl in black also fighting the Hetero-Creatures rushing coming at her.'}
{3: 'The girl pierces a Hetero-Creature with her black greatsword. Another flock of bird-like Hetero-Creatures dives from the sky—only to meet their bitter end when she shoots them off.'}
{1: '2', 3: 'The shockwave from the cannon fire lifts the hood off the girl, revealing uneven black twin tails.'}
{3: "She glances at Alpha, who's distracted by the Hetero-Creatures, her bright blue eyes blinking, as if in thought."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The girl aims her cannon at Alpha, a cannonball shattering the Hetero-Creatures behind Alpha.'}
{3: 'She signals Alpha with her eyes, seemingly asking for her help to clear out the immediate threat.'}
{2: 'α', 3: "...You've got to be kidding me.", 4: '1'}

{3: "Frustrated by the girl's capricious attitude, Alpha raises her sword all the same, deciding to first get rid of these Hetero-Creatures that are behaving less than normal before she does anything else."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{3: 'Silence returns to the street when the last Hetero-Creature is slashed and lets out a final screech.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl in black looks at Alpha, standing beside a pile of Hetero-Creature corpses, ponders for a moment, and then plants her sword into the ground.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'What did you say?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'It took Alpha a moment to realize the girl was answering the question she asked at the very beginning.'}
{3: "Even so, Alpha doesn't easily let down her guard. Her hand rests on the kodachi at her waist, her gaze sharp."}
{3: "But the girl ignores her hostility, approaching Alpha as though she can't take the hint."}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'I thought you were one of them because you smell just like "them."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She points at the Hetero-Creatures on the ground, clarifying her reason for attacking Alpha.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Because of the "Punishing Virus"? You\'ve got to be joking...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'But, it seems you have no idea what the "Punishing Virus" or "Ascendants" are...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'The Punishing Virus... wasn\'t something that "this world" had to begin with, so it makes perfect sense that I don\'t know what it is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: '"This world"...? What exactly are you talking about?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: "Don't you remember how you got here?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Faced with the girl's retort, Alpha is somewhat baffled."}
{3: "She was just on the surface scouring like she always had, looking for a way to sever Luna's deep connection with the Ascension-Network."}
{3: "Then, out of nowhere, she was attacked by this girl. Even now, she still doesn't quite understand what happened."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4001_02.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4001_02.jpg'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'So, do you remember that castle?'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...What castle?'}
{3: 'Alpha turns her head toward where the girl is pointing.'}
{3: 'With it, Alpha finds herself a little dumbfounded.'}
{3: 'She has borne witness to countless inconceivable creations and wonders, but none of those has prepared her for what unfolds before her.'}
{3: "It's a castle standing in the distance, towering into the clouds."}
{3: 'Surrounded by ruins, the black-and-white castle looks incredibly majestic.'}
{3: 'Thinking her visual terminal might be malfunctioning, Alpha closes her eyes and shakes her head, but the castle remains when she reopens her eyes.'}
{3: "Something like this can't just pop out of the ground overnight, but Alpha has no choice but to believe the castle is not an illusion seeing it stand before herself."}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'Did this exist in your world?'}
{3: "The answer is, of course, no, but judging from the girl's attitude, Alpha is starting to contemplate another idea—one she finds hard to accept at the moment."}
{3: 'This is not the world she knows, not the earth being ravaged by the Punishing Virus.'}
{3: "Alpha stares at the mysterious girl. As if confirming Alpha's thoughts, the flame in her left eye burns on quietly."}
